mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fact_partial_release ( af_pf_key, material_id, spec_kind, quantity ) VALUES ( #{af_pf_key}, #{material_id}, #{spec_kind}, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT af_pf_key, material_id, spec_kind, quantity FROM fact_partial_release WHERE af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} AND material_id = #{material_id} AND spec_kind = #{spec_kind}

SELECT omr_notifi_no, mdl.name as model_name, ma.level, sum(quantity) as quantity FROM `fact_partial_release` fpr JOIN `af_production_feature` af_pf ON fpr.af_pf_key = af_pf.af_pf_key JOIN `material` ma ON fpr.material_id = ma.material_id JOIN `model` mdl ON ma.model_id = mdl.model_id WHERE af_pf.operator_id = #{operator_id} and (af_pf.action_time > current_date OR af_pf.operator_id = 00000000000) and fpr.spec_kind = 0 GROUP BY ma.material_id ORDER BY omr_notifi_no ;
SELECT sum(quantity) as quantity FROM `fact_partial_release` fpr WHERE fpr.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} and fpr.spec_kind = 0 ;
